img.alt: LJHS Construction Progress Blog with Red Storm Image on black background

div.p: The new Lincoln Jr. High School is expected to open in 2020. We look forward to sharing the project's progress with you right here on our LJHS Construction Progress Blog.
If you are interested in more information about our three various programs, contact Jefferson Elementary and complete an online application.

h3.a: PCSC Sack Lunch Program Pickup on Mondays and Tuesdays

div.p: The Plymouth Community School Corporation Sack Lunch Program is available for all PCSC students.
A team of teachers have been busy trying to make a difference and save lives by printing protective face shields in their spare time.

h3.a: Upcoming Food Bank of Northern Indiana Bonus Food Distributions

div.p: The Food Bank of Northern Indiana is having a drive-through distribution event for Marshall County at PHS on Thursday, April 16, 2020 from 10 a.m. until noon.

611 Berkley Street, Plymouth, IN 46563
Ph: 574.936.3115, Fx: 574.936.3160
